column1: Smoque BBQ////My BF is originally from Texas
column2: and one of the drawbacks for him is that there is no good BBQ in Chicago
column3: or Illinois for that matter.  The flip side for me is there is no good pizza or italian in Texas.  A coworker recommended Smoque
column4: claiming it was the best BBQ they've had in the midwest.  I checked it out on Yelp
column5: and it seems the consesus is this is the best in Chicago.
